messages.messageBody:
I think if you did have a separate gallery with a 'key' to enter, that
would solve the conflict between the rated-G images and the rated-R
stuff.

I THOUGHT I was going to have an RK Saitou for the gallery, but he is
looking more & more like Elvis instead *frowns*. I'm trying! :D

<secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:

messages.subject: Gallery Online....
messages.msgSnippet: http://shinsengumihq.com/CMS/index.php?%28Makoto%29:Gallery I wanted a really awesome gallery (but likely our server won t be happy with another format for
messages.messageBody:
http://shinsengumihq.com/CMS/index.php?%28Makoto%29:Gallery

I wanted a really awesome gallery (but likely our server won't be
happy with another format for just images) but this was the fastest
solution...simply create thumbnails and resize images.

Please feel free to send us anything *original* or fanart related
(manga, comic strip, parodies, sculptures, digital art)...anything as
long as it's not "adult" related (e.g. art which shows blatant
sexuality)...(we are not averse to yaoi/yuri however this gallery is
for public viewing and we have to be sure we aren't exposing kids to
mature material).

Artists who have their own dev-art gallery can also drop us a line
and we'll link to your image on dev-art so people can leave you
messages and you get more traffic. I did this for S-girl's
Shinsengumi art (if you visit her gallery you will find more Rurouni
Kenshin fanart too http://s-girl.deviantart.com/)

I know that in the 2nd paragraph I said that the SHQ gallery has to
be somewhat rated-G...but I'm actually tempted to start drawing more
adult stuff too which I'll post in the future (yuri/yaoi...and maybe
even straight stuff).

I'm into shinsengumi x shinsengumi
Aizu Joshitai x Joshitai (women's samurai brigade)

that sort of stuff (not -hentai- but pervy enough)... XD
